marklogic.body: Thanks for your article. It is very unfortunate that over the last years, the travel industry has had to deal with terrorism, SARS, tsunamis, influenza, swine Flu, plus the first ever entire global tough economy. Through everything the industry has proven to be sturdy, resilient in addition to dynamic, locating new strategies to deal with trouble. There are Always fresh complications and opportunity to which the business must once more adapt and behave.
